seo.title: Ricardo Augusto Kowalski | Front-End Developer
seo.description: I'm a front-end developer with over +10 year of experience, currently working on Typescript, React and Next.js stack.

Home.title: Ricardo Augusto Kowalski
text: I'm a front-end developer for over +10 years, most of thi time I've worked with a lot of coffee and playlists on the development of websites, landing pages, e-commerces and web systems. I'm 28 and I have a bachelor degree in Advertising.

Now, my main focus of study and work has been Typescript, React, Next.js and Node.js stack on which I'm looking forward to work on, and of cource, I'm constantly studing and updating my knowledge on web development.
This page is still under construction, but I'm available for new opportunitiesor maybe a chat, feel free to contact me on ricardoakowalski@gmail.com or by any other social network:

buttons.email: Send me a message by e-mail
buttons.github: Check out my projects and activities on GitHub
buttons.behance: Check out some of visual projects on Behance
